name: Swift CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, develop ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, develop ]

jobs:
  build-macos:
    name: Build on macOS
    runs-on: macos-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Select Xcode
      run: sudo xcode-select -s /Applications/Xcode_15.2.app
    
    - name: Swift Version
      run: swift --version
    
    - name: Build
      run: swift build -v
    
    - name: Run tests
      run: swift test -v

  build-linux:
    name: Build on Linux
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Install Swift
      uses: swift-actions/setup-swift@v1
      with:
        swift-version: "5.9"
    
    - name: Swift Version
      run: swift --version
    
    - name: Build
      run: swift build -v
    
    - name: Run tests
      run: swift test -v

  build-ios:
    name: Build for iOS
    runs-on: macos-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Select Xcode
      run: sudo xcode-select -s /Applications/Xcode_15.2.app
    
    - name: Build for iOS
      run: |
        xcodebuild -scheme ColourJourney \
                   -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,name=iPhone 15' \
                   -skipPackagePluginValidation \
                   build
    
    - name: Build for iOS Device
      run: |
        xcodebuild -scheme ColourJourney \
                   -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' \
                   -skipPackagePluginValidation \
                   build

  lint:
    name: Swift Lint
    runs-on: macos-latest
    
    steps:
    - uses: actions/checkout@v4
    
    - name: Lint
      run: |
        # Add SwiftLint if desired
        echo "Linting would run here"
